name: Duke Nukem: Critical Mass
description:
Duke Nukem is back and better than ever on the Nintendo DS

The King of Action is back in the first of three multi-mode adventures spanning over 100 years. Duke’s original nemesis, Proton, is up to his old tricks and has unified all those who have opposed Duke in the past. The Earth Defense Force attempts to ensure the Earth’s continued security by transporting Duke into the future. Ironically, just moments after Duke’s departure, Proton launches a devastating attack on Earth!

-The first Duke game to incorporate 5 different gameplay styles
-Co-op multiplayer gameplay
-Full use of Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection
-The highest quality in-game graphics the DS is capable of producing
-Industry-first “drag-n-drop” user-defined controls
-Gameplay and story customized for the DS
